title: Escape The Hell Myth
subtitle: Rediscover The Teachings Of Jesus On Love
author: Ansilo Boff
tags: Hell Doctrine, Psychological Trauma, Paul Theology, Jesus Teachings, Universal Reconciliation, Biblical Inerrancy, Fear vs Love, Yahweh vs Father, Jesus vs Paul, Spiritual Liberation
description: A revolutionary examination of how the doctrine of hell has caused psychological trauma, contrasting the fear-based theology of Paul with the love-centered teachings of Jesus, and exploring the ancient Hebrew understanding of Yahweh versus the Father that Jesus revealed.
